title: Chapter Metadata Schema
description: Validation schema for Docusaurus chapter frontmatter in Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook. Enforces metadata standards for learning objectives, prerequisites, content types, and SEO fields.

title.description: Chapter title displayed in navigation and page header. Should be concise and descriptive.

description.description: SEO meta description for search engines and social media. Ideal length is 120-160 characters.
examples: Learn how to calculate robot end-effector positions using forward kinematics transformations with practical examples.

keywords.description: SEO keywords for search indexing and discovery. Choose specific, relevant terms.

sidebar_position.description: Position in sidebar navigation (positive integer). Lower numbers appear first.

items.description: Learning objective starting with a Bloom's taxonomy verb (Understand, Apply, Analyze, etc.)

learning_objectives.description: 2-5 measurable learning objectives using Bloom's taxonomy verbs. Each should describe what learners will be able to do after completing the chapter.
examples: Understand the Denavit-Hartenberg (DH) convention for robot modeling
Calculate transformation matrices for robotic manipulators
Compute end-effector position and orientation from joint angles
Apply forward kinematics to 2-DOF and 3-DOF robot arms

items.description: Path to prerequisite chapter relative to docs/ directory

prerequisites.description: Array of paths to prerequisite chapters. Can be empty if no prerequisites are required.

estimated_time.description: Estimated reading/completion time in minutes. Should be a multiple of 5 (e.g., 15, 30, 45).

content_type.description: Content variant type that determines template structure and emphasis. Tutorial = step-by-step, Concept = explanatory, Hands-on Lab = practical exercise, Reference = lookup/API.

difficulty.description: Difficulty level for reader expectations. Beginner = introductory with minimal prerequisites, Intermediate = foundational knowledge required, Advanced = expert-level with complex concepts.

oneOf.description: Path to previous page (relative to docs/)

pagination_prev.description: Override the default previous page link in pagination. Set to null to disable. Docusaurus built-in feature.

oneOf.description: Path to next page (relative to docs/)

pagination_next.description: Override the default next page link in pagination. Set to null to disable. Docusaurus built-in feature.

tags.description: Tags for filtering and organization. Docusaurus built-in feature that enables tag-based navigation.

draft.description: Hide this page from production builds. Useful during authoring. Docusaurus built-in feature.
